ygData.subject: Re: Rahotep
ygData.msgSnippet: Not if you are a cleric,  you can use sense undead to track him.   It can be hard if other undead are nearby but I did use it to track rhaotep months ago.
ygData.messageBody:
Not if you are a cleric, you can use sense undead to track him. It can
be hard if other undead are nearby but I did use it to track rhaotep
months ago.

(Just happened to be lucky and find him, didn't use any method for when he
would spawn)


On Tue, 2 Nov 1999, Curtis Bennett wrote:

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> Anyone have any information on where/when Rahotep spawns? Rahotep,
> being, of course, the named mummy that spawns in North Ro that drops
> the Scepter of Rahotep (a 9/38 1-handed weapon).
>
> I had read that he spawns just south of the undead ruins every two
> days at midnight. But I was there on an odd and an even day at
> midnight and no Rahotep. I talked to one person in the zone and they
> said they saw Rahotep near the Runed pillar (next to the beach)
> and the sun was out.
>
> Is this something I'm gonna need a ranger for?
>
> >
